PERSONA:
meet elizabeth, a 68-year-old married woman residing in a metropolitan area of the midwest region. as a college graduate with some post-graduate education, she has a strong educational background. elizabeth identifies as a white non-hispanic american, born and raised in the united states.

elizabeth is a devout protestant, attending religious services once or twice a month. while not identifying as a born-again or evangelical christian, her faith plays an important role in her life.

politically, elizabeth considers herself an independent voter, though she leans towards the democratic party. her ideological views can be described as moderate to conservative democrat. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously.

financially, elizabeth falls into the middle-income bracket, with an annual family income between $80,000 and $90,000. despite her age, she is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day.

while not currently involved in volunteering activities, elizabeth values community engagement and may consider exploring such opportunities in the future.

overall, elizabeth is a well-educated, financially stable, and socially engaged individual who balances her traditional values with a moderate political outlook and an open-minded approach to technology and modern life.
